import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./inquiry_form.css"; // ✅ Import CSS const InquiryForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ inquiryDate: "", fullName: "", gender: "", dob: "", contactNumber: "", alternateNumber: "", email: "", address: "", education: "", occupation: "", courses: "", mode: "", knowledge: "", batchTiming: "", startDate: "", source: "", remarks: "", inquiryTakenBy: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const res = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/inquiries", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(formData), }); const data = await res.json(); alert("✅ Inquiry submitted!"); console.log(data); } catch (err) { console.error("Error submitting inquiry:", err); } }; return (

📋 IT Academy - Inquiry Form

{/* Inquiry Date */}
{/* Full Name */}
{/* Gender */}
{/* Date of Birth */}
{/* Contact Number */}
{/* Alternate Number */}
{/* Email */}
{/* Address */}
{/* Education */}
{/* Occupation */}
{/* Courses */}
{/* Mode */}
{/* Knowledge */}
{/* Batch Timing */}
{/* Start Date */}
{/* Source */}
{/* Remarks */}
{/* Taken By */}
{/* Submit */}
); }; export default InquiryForm;
